actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: Makes it the sense of the Senate that the President shall immediately institute a program of stringent economic and trade sanctions against the Soviet Union to remain in force until the Arab embargo of petroleum products to the United States terminated.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President shall immediately institute a program of stringent economic and trade sanctions against the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics to remain in force until the Arab embargo of petroleum products to the United States is terminated.

titles.title: Makes it the sense of the Senate that the President shall immediately institute a program of stringent economic and trade sanctions against the Soviet Union to remain in force until the Arab embargo of petroleum products to the United States terminated.
